publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3193 Rhoda Grant: The Loch Ness Partnershipâ€”That the Parliament supports the work of the organisations involved in the Loch Ness partnership and the launch of their initial plan for the area; notes the importance of sustainable economic and social development to the area while ensuring that the unique environment is respected; further notes that particular focus has been placed on maximising business opportunities, marketing, land and transport, and congratulates all those involved in promoting the Loch Ness area.
S1M-3193 The Loch Ness Partnership (lodged on 11 June 2002) Scott Barrie*
S1M-3193 The Loch Ness Partnership (lodged on 11 June 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mary Scanlon*

S1M-3193 Rhoda Grant: The Loch Ness Partnership-That the Parliament supports the work of the organisations involved in the Loch Ness partnership and the launch of their initial plan for the area; notes the importance of sustainable economic and social development to the area while ensuring that the unique environment is respected; further notes that particular focus has been placed on maximising business opportunities, marketing, land and transport, and congratulates all those involved in promoting the Loch Ness area. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mary Scanlon
S1M-3193 The Loch Ness Partnership (lodged on 11 June 2002) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-3193 The Loch Ness Partnership (lodged on 11 June 2002) Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-3193 The Loch Ness Partnership (lodged on 11 June 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-3193 The Loch Ness Partnership (lodged on 11 June 2002) Helen Eadie*
